uvi.product_version: versions from v5.2 to before v5.10.46
uvi.description:
x86/fpu: Invalidate FPU state after a failed XRSTOR from a user buffer

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.46 by commit a7748e021b9fb7739e3cb88449296539de0b6817, it was introduced in version v5.2 by commit 1d731e731c4cd7cbd3b1aa295f0932e7610da82f. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: x86/fpu: Invalidate FPU state after a failed XRSTOR from a user buffer
